attributes.action: Make voting in National and local elections compulsory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has always struck me that any election in which a large percentage of the population do NOT vote can never produce a truly representative government of the people. We fought and struggled for more than a thousand years to make this nation democratic and great and handed on the idea of democracy to nations the world over.
Is it too much to ask that each of us show that we care enough to vote every few years? Like some other countries i would like to see voting made compulsory.
